Mathematics.description: Advanced Mathematics covering calculus and algebra.

Physics.description: Introductory Physics focusing on mechanics and thermodynamics.

Chemistry.description: Fundamentals of Chemistry, covering atomic structure and chemical reactions.

Biology.description: An overview of biological concepts including cell structure and genetics.

Data Structures.description: Introduction to data structures including arrays, linked lists, and trees.

Operating Systems.description: An in-depth look at operating systems and how they manage resources.

Database Management Systems.description: Fundamentals of database design and SQL.

Web Development.description: Introduction to web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Software Engineering.description: Principles of software development methodologies and project management.

Circuit Analysis.description: Study of circuit theory and analysis techniques.

Electromagnetic Fields.description: Introduction to electromagnetic fields and their applications.

Control Systems.description: Fundamentals of control systems and feedback mechanisms.
syllabus: Open Loop and Closed Loop Systems

Structural Analysis.description: Analyzing structures for stability and strength.

Fluid Mechanics.description: Study of fluid behavior and its applications in engineering.

Geotechnical Engineering.description: Fundamentals of soil mechanics and foundation design.
